meanings.definition: Resembling an owl in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The large eyes and silent flight of the owllike creature fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The tree branch was the perfect perch for the owllike bird to observe its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The costume party had many creative outfits, but the owllike costume was a real hoot!
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom and calm demeanor made her seem owllike in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The eerie call of the owllike creature echoed through the night, sending shivers down my spine.
